mapper.select: select wor.operate_id AS operateId, wor.deal_type AS dealType, wor.service_type AS serviceType, wor.charge_type AS chargeType, wor.pay_type AS payType, IFNULL(wor.service_type, wor.charge_type) AS type1, IFNULL(wor.deal_type, wor.pay_type) AS type2, wor.description AS description, CASE WHEN tp.id IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END transferParts, IFNULL(wor.finished_status, 1) AS finishedStatus, IFNULL(wor.sub_twice_mark, 0) AS subTwiceMark from work_order_operate wor LEFT JOIN work_order_transfer_parts tp ON tp.wo_code = wor.wo_code AND tp.operate_id = wor.operate_id AND tp.status = #{status} where 1 = 1 AND wor.wo_code = #{woCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND wor.operate_code = #{operateCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY wor.operate_id ORDER BY finishedStatus, wor.id
